title: Is Gal Gadot the right actress to play Wonder Woman?

og.title: Is Gal Gadot the right actress to play Wonder Woman?
og.description: Answer (1 of 106): NO. Wonder Woman stands for peace and unity, Gal Gadot supports an army whose agenda includes war crimes and genocide. The beauty of Wonder Woman is her commitment truth and justice. Gal Gadot is pro-IDF and a proud Zionist, she’s a former militant of one of the most barbarous ...
